Hack on GitHub Pages
  • Resources

Resources

This site is built with GitHub Pages, which uses Jekyll. To develop, I suggest you use Docker to run a local version of Jekyll and preview changes before pushing them up to your website. To start your server, run: docker-compose up

The site stylesheet is built with Bootstrap, Bootswatch and Font Awesome.
